7// copyvertex.inc.h: Implementation of vertex buffer copying and conversion functions
8
9namespace rx
10{
11
12template <typename T,
13 size_t inputComponentCount,
14 size_t outputComponentCount,
15 uint32_t alphaDefaultValueBits>
16inline void CopyNativeVertexData(const uint8_t *input, size_t stride, size_t count, uint8_t *output)
17{
18 const size_t attribSize = sizeof(T) * inputComponentCount;
19
20 if (attribSize == stride && inputComponentCount == outputComponentCount)
21 {
22 memcpy(output, input, count * attribSize);
23 return;
24 }
25
26 if (inputComponentCount == outputComponentCount)
27 {
28 for (size_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
29 {
30 const T *offsetInput = reinterpret_cast<const T *>(input + (i * stride));
31 T *offsetOutput = reinterpret_cast<T *>(output) + i * outputComponentCount;
32
33 memcpy(offsetOutput, offsetInput, attribSize);
34 }
35 return;
36 }
37
38 const T defaultAlphaValue = gl::bitCast<T>(alphaDefaultValueBits);
39 const size_t lastNonAlphaOutputComponent = std::min<size_t>(outputComponentCount, 3);
40
41 for (size_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
42 {
43 const T *offsetInput = reinterpret_cast<const T *>(input + (i * stride));
44 T *offsetOutput = reinterpret_cast<T *>(output) + i * outputComponentCount;
45
46 memcpy(offsetOutput, offsetInput, attribSize);
47
48 if (inputComponentCount < lastNonAlphaOutputComponent)
49 {
50 // Set the remaining G/B channels to 0.
51 size_t numComponents = (lastNonAlphaOutputComponent - inputComponentCount);
52 memset(&offsetOutput[inputComponentCount], 0, numComponents * sizeof(T));
53 }
54
55 if (inputComponentCount < outputComponentCount && outputComponentCount == 4)
56 {
57 // Set the remaining alpha channel to the defaultAlphaValue.
58 offsetOutput[3] = defaultAlphaValue;
59 }
60 }
61}
62
63template <size_t inputComponentCount, size_t outputComponentCount>
64inline void Copy8SintTo16SintVertexData(const uint8_t *input,
65 size_t stride,
66 size_t count,
67 uint8_t *output)
68{
69 const size_t lastNonAlphaOutputComponent = std::min<size_t>(outputComponentCount, 3);
70
71 for (size_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
72 {
73 const GLbyte *offsetInput = reinterpret_cast<const GLbyte *>(input + i * stride);
74 GLshort *offsetOutput = reinterpret_cast<GLshort *>(output) + i * outputComponentCount;
75
76 for (size_t j = 0; j < inputComponentCount; j++)
77 {
78 offsetOutput[j] = static_cast<GLshort>(offsetInput[j]);
79 }
80
81 for (size_t j = inputComponentCount; j < lastNonAlphaOutputComponent; j++)
82 {
83 // Set remaining G/B channels to 0.
84 offsetOutput[j] = 0;
85 }
86
87 if (inputComponentCount < outputComponentCount && outputComponentCount == 4)
88 {
89 // On integer formats, we must set the Alpha channel to 1 if it's unused.
90 offsetOutput[3] = 1;
91 }
92 }
93}
94
95template <size_t inputComponentCount, size_t outputComponentCount>
96inline void Copy8SnormTo16SnormVertexData(const uint8_t *input,
97 size_t stride,
98 size_t count,
99 uint8_t *output)
100{
101 for (size_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
102 {
103 const GLbyte *offsetInput = reinterpret_cast<const GLbyte *>(input + i * stride);
104 GLshort *offsetOutput = reinterpret_cast<GLshort *>(output) + i * outputComponentCount;
105
106 for (size_t j = 0; j < inputComponentCount; j++)
107 {
108 // The original GLbyte value ranges from -128 to +127 (INT8_MAX).
109 // When converted to GLshort, the value must be scaled to between -32768 and +32767
110 // (INT16_MAX).
111 if (offsetInput[j] > 0)
112 {
113 offsetOutput[j] =
114 offsetInput[j] << 8 | offsetInput[j] << 1 | ((offsetInput[j] & 0x40) >> 6);
115 }
116 else
117 {
118 offsetOutput[j] = offsetInput[j] << 8;
119 }
120 }
121
122 for (size_t j = inputComponentCount; j < std::min<size_t>(outputComponentCount, 3); j++)
123 {
124 // Set remaining G/B channels to 0.
125 offsetOutput[j] = 0;
126 }
127
128 if (inputComponentCount < outputComponentCount && outputComponentCount == 4)
129 {
130 // On normalized formats, we must set the Alpha channel to the max value if it's unused.
131 offsetOutput[3] = INT16_MAX;
132 }
133 }
134}
135
136template <size_t inputComponentCount, size_t outputComponentCount>
137inline void Copy32FixedTo32FVertexData(const uint8_t *input,
138 size_t stride,
139 size_t count,
140 uint8_t *output)
141{
142 static const float divisor = 1.0f / (1 << 16);
143
144 for (size_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
145 {
146 const uint8_t *offsetInput = input + i * stride;
147 float *offsetOutput = reinterpret_cast<float *>(output) + i * outputComponentCount;
148
149 // GLfixed access must be 4-byte aligned on arm32, input and stride sometimes are not
150 if (reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(offsetInput) % sizeof(GLfixed) == 0)
151 {
152 for (size_t j = 0; j < inputComponentCount; j++)
153 {
154 offsetOutput[j] =
155 static_cast<float>(reinterpret_cast<const GLfixed *>(offsetInput)[j]) * divisor;
156 }
157 }
158 else
159 {
160 for (size_t j = 0; j < inputComponentCount; j++)
161 {
162 GLfixed alignedInput;
163 memcpy(&alignedInput, offsetInput + j * sizeof(GLfixed), sizeof(GLfixed));
164 offsetOutput[j] = static_cast<float>(alignedInput) * divisor;
165 }
166 }
167
168 // 4-component output formats would need special padding in the alpha channel.
169 static_assert(!(inputComponentCount < 4 && outputComponentCount == 4),
170 "An inputComponentCount less than 4 and an outputComponentCount equal to 4 "
171 "is not supported.");
172
173 for (size_t j = inputComponentCount; j < outputComponentCount; j++)
174 {
175 offsetOutput[j] = 0.0f;
176 }
177 }
178}
179
180template <typename T, size_t inputComponentCount, size_t outputComponentCount, bool normalized>
181inline void CopyTo32FVertexData(const uint8_t *input, size_t stride, size_t count, uint8_t *output)
182{
183 typedef std::numeric_limits<T> NL;
184
185 for (size_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
186 {
187 const T *offsetInput = reinterpret_cast<const T *>(input + (stride * i));
188 float *offsetOutput = reinterpret_cast<float *>(output) + i * outputComponentCount;
189
190 for (size_t j = 0; j < inputComponentCount; j++)
191 {
192 if (normalized)
193 {
194 if (NL::is_signed)
195 {
196 offsetOutput[j] = static_cast<float>(offsetInput[j]) / NL::max();
197 offsetOutput[j] = (offsetOutput[j] >= -1.0f) ? (offsetOutput[j]) : (-1.0f);
198 }
199 else
200 {
201 offsetOutput[j] = static_cast<float>(offsetInput[j]) / NL::max();
202 }
203 }
204 else
205 {
206 offsetOutput[j] = static_cast<float>(offsetInput[j]);
207 }
208 }
209
210 // This would require special padding.
211 static_assert(!(inputComponentCount < 4 && outputComponentCount == 4),
212 "An inputComponentCount less than 4 and an outputComponentCount equal to 4 "
213 "is not supported.");
214
215 for (size_t j = inputComponentCount; j < outputComponentCount; j++)
216 {
217 offsetOutput[j] = 0.0f;
218 }
219 }
220}
221
222template <size_t inputComponentCount, size_t outputComponentCount>
223void Copy32FTo16FVertexData(const uint8_t *input, size_t stride, size_t count, uint8_t *output)
224{
225 const unsigned short kZero = gl::float32ToFloat16(0.0f);
226 const unsigned short kOne = gl::float32ToFloat16(1.0f);
227
228 for (size_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
229 {
230 const float *offsetInput = reinterpret_cast<const float *>(input + (stride * i));
231 unsigned short *offsetOutput =
232 reinterpret_cast<unsigned short *>(output) + i * outputComponentCount;
233
234 for (size_t j = 0; j < inputComponentCount; j++)
235 {
236 offsetOutput[j] = gl::float32ToFloat16(offsetInput[j]);
237 }
238
239 for (size_t j = inputComponentCount; j < outputComponentCount; j++)
240 {
241 offsetOutput[j] = (j == 3) ? kOne : kZero;
242 }
243 }
244}
245
246inline void CopyXYZ32FToXYZ9E5(const uint8_t *input, size_t stride, size_t count, uint8_t *output)
247{
248 for (size_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
249 {
250 const float *offsetInput = reinterpret_cast<const float *>(input + (stride * i));
251 unsigned int *offsetOutput = reinterpret_cast<unsigned int *>(output) + i;
252
253 *offsetOutput = gl::convertRGBFloatsTo999E5(offsetInput[0], offsetInput[1], offsetInput[2]);
254 }
255}
256
257inline void CopyXYZ32FToX11Y11B10F(const uint8_t *input,
258 size_t stride,
259 size_t count,
260 uint8_t *output)
261{
262 for (size_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
263 {
264 const float *offsetInput = reinterpret_cast<const float *>(input + (stride * i));
265 unsigned int *offsetOutput = reinterpret_cast<unsigned int *>(output) + i;
266
267 *offsetOutput = gl::float32ToFloat11(offsetInput[0]) << 0 |
268 gl::float32ToFloat11(offsetInput[1]) << 11 |
269 gl::float32ToFloat10(offsetInput[2]) << 22;
270 }
271}
272
273namespace priv
274{
275
276template <bool isSigned, bool normalized, bool toFloat>
277static inline void CopyPackedRGB(uint32_t data, uint8_t *output)
278{
279 const uint32_t rgbSignMask = 0x200; // 1 set at the 9 bit
280 const uint32_t negativeMask = 0xFFFFFC00; // All bits from 10 to 31 set to 1
281
282 if (toFloat)
283 {
284 GLfloat *floatOutput = reinterpret_cast<GLfloat *>(output);
285 if (isSigned)
286 {
287 GLfloat finalValue = 0;
288 if (data & rgbSignMask)
289 {
290 int negativeNumber = data | negativeMask;
291 finalValue = static_cast<GLfloat>(negativeNumber);
292 }
293 else
294 {
295 finalValue = static_cast<GLfloat>(data);
296 }
297
298 if (normalized)
299 {
300 const int32_t maxValue = 0x1FF; // 1 set in bits 0 through 8
301 const int32_t minValue = 0xFFFFFE01; // Inverse of maxValue
302
303 // A 10-bit two's complement number has the possibility of being minValue - 1 but
304 // OpenGL's normalization rules dictate that it should be clamped to minValue in
305 // this case.
306 if (finalValue < minValue)
307 {
308 finalValue = minValue;
309 }
310
311 const int32_t halfRange = (maxValue - minValue) >> 1;
312 *floatOutput = ((finalValue - minValue) / halfRange) - 1.0f;
313 }
314 else
315 {
316 *floatOutput = finalValue;
317 }
318 }
319 else
320 {
321 if (normalized)
322 {
323 const uint32_t maxValue = 0x3FF; // 1 set in bits 0 through 9
324 *floatOutput = static_cast<GLfloat>(data) / static_cast<GLfloat>(maxValue);
325 }
326 else
327 {
328 *floatOutput = static_cast<GLfloat>(data);
329 }
330 }
331 }
332 else
333 {
334 if (isSigned)
335 {
336 GLshort *intOutput = reinterpret_cast<GLshort *>(output);
337
338 if (data & rgbSignMask)
339 {
340 *intOutput = static_cast<GLshort>(data | negativeMask);
341 }
342 else
343 {
344 *intOutput = static_cast<GLshort>(data);
345 }
346 }
347 else
348 {
349 GLushort *uintOutput = reinterpret_cast<GLushort *>(output);
350 *uintOutput = static_cast<GLushort>(data);
351 }
352 }
353}
354
355template <bool isSigned, bool normalized, bool toFloat>
356inline void CopyPackedAlpha(uint32_t data, uint8_t *output)
357{
358 if (toFloat)
359 {
360 GLfloat *floatOutput = reinterpret_cast<GLfloat *>(output);
361 if (isSigned)
362 {
363 if (normalized)
364 {
365 switch (data)
366 {
367 case 0x0:
368 *floatOutput = 0.0f;
369 break;
370 case 0x1:
371 *floatOutput = 1.0f;
372 break;
373 case 0x2:
374 *floatOutput = -1.0f;
375 break;
376 case 0x3:
377 *floatOutput = -1.0f;
378 break;
379 default:
380 UNREACHABLE();
381 }
382 }
383 else
384 {
385 switch (data)
386 {
387 case 0x0:
388 *floatOutput = 0.0f;
389 break;
390 case 0x1:
391 *floatOutput = 1.0f;
392 break;
393 case 0x2:
394 *floatOutput = -2.0f;
395 break;
396 case 0x3:
397 *floatOutput = -1.0f;
398 break;
399 default:
400 UNREACHABLE();
401 }
402 }
403 }
404 else
405 {
406 if (normalized)
407 {
408 switch (data)
409 {
410 case 0x0:
411 *floatOutput = 0.0f / 3.0f;
412 break;
413 case 0x1:
414 *floatOutput = 1.0f / 3.0f;
415 break;
416 case 0x2:
417 *floatOutput = 2.0f / 3.0f;
418 break;
419 case 0x3:
420 *floatOutput = 3.0f / 3.0f;
421 break;
422 default:
423 UNREACHABLE();
424 }
425 }
426 else
427 {
428 switch (data)
429 {
430 case 0x0:
431 *floatOutput = 0.0f;
432 break;
433 case 0x1:
434 *floatOutput = 1.0f;
435 break;
436 case 0x2:
437 *floatOutput = 2.0f;
438 break;
439 case 0x3:
440 *floatOutput = 3.0f;
441 break;
442 default:
443 UNREACHABLE();
444 }
445 }
446 }
447 }
448 else
449 {
450 if (isSigned)
451 {
452 GLshort *intOutput = reinterpret_cast<GLshort *>(output);
453 switch (data)
454 {
455 case 0x0:
456 *intOutput = 0;
457 break;
458 case 0x1:
459 *intOutput = 1;
460 break;
461 case 0x2:
462 *intOutput = -2;
463 break;
464 case 0x3:
465 *intOutput = -1;
466 break;
467 default:
468 UNREACHABLE();
469 }
470 }
471 else
472 {
473 GLushort *uintOutput = reinterpret_cast<GLushort *>(output);
474 switch (data)
475 {
476 case 0x0:
477 *uintOutput = 0;
478 break;
479 case 0x1:
480 *uintOutput = 1;
481 break;
482 case 0x2:
483 *uintOutput = 2;
484 break;
485 case 0x3:
486 *uintOutput = 3;
487 break;
488 default:
489 UNREACHABLE();
490 }
491 }
492 }
493}
494
495} // namespace priv
496
497template <bool isSigned, bool normalized, bool toFloat>
498inline void CopyXYZ10W2ToXYZW32FVertexData(const uint8_t *input,
499 size_t stride,
500 size_t count,
501 uint8_t *output)
502{
503 const size_t outputComponentSize = toFloat ? 4 : 2;
504 const size_t componentCount = 4;
505
506 const uint32_t rgbMask = 0x3FF; // 1 set in bits 0 through 9
507 const size_t redShift = 0; // red is bits 0 through 9
508 const size_t greenShift = 10; // green is bits 10 through 19
509 const size_t blueShift = 20; // blue is bits 20 through 29
510
511 const uint32_t alphaMask = 0x3; // 1 set in bits 0 and 1
512 const size_t alphaShift = 30; // Alpha is the 30 and 31 bits
513
514 for (size_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
515 {
516 GLuint packedValue = *reinterpret_cast<const GLuint *>(input + (i * stride));
517 uint8_t *offsetOutput = output + (i * outputComponentSize * componentCount);
518
519 priv::CopyPackedRGB<isSigned, normalized, toFloat>(
520 (packedValue >> redShift) & rgbMask, offsetOutput + (0 * outputComponentSize));
521 priv::CopyPackedRGB<isSigned, normalized, toFloat>(
522 (packedValue >> greenShift) & rgbMask, offsetOutput + (1 * outputComponentSize));
523 priv::CopyPackedRGB<isSigned, normalized, toFloat>(
524 (packedValue >> blueShift) & rgbMask, offsetOutput + (2 * outputComponentSize));
525 priv::CopyPackedAlpha<isSigned, normalized, toFloat>(
526 (packedValue >> alphaShift) & alphaMask, offsetOutput + (3 * outputComponentSize));
527 }
528}
529
530template <bool isSigned, bool normalized>
531inline void CopyXYZ10ToXYZW32FVertexData(const uint8_t *input,
532 size_t stride,
533 size_t count,
534 uint8_t *output)
535{
536 const size_t outputComponentSize = 4;
537 const size_t componentCount = 4;
538
539 const uint32_t rgbMask = 0x3FF; // 1 set in bits 0 through 9
540 const size_t redShift = 22; // red is bits 22 through 31
541 const size_t greenShift = 12; // green is bits 12 through 21
542 const size_t blueShift = 2; // blue is bits 2 through 11
543
544 const uint32_t alphaDefaultValueBits = normalized ? (isSigned ? 0x1 : 0x3) : 0x1;
545
546 for (size_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
547 {
548 GLuint packedValue = *reinterpret_cast<const GLuint *>(input + (i * stride));
549 uint8_t *offsetOutput = output + (i * outputComponentSize * componentCount);
550
551 priv::CopyPackedRGB<isSigned, normalized, true>((packedValue >> redShift) & rgbMask,
552 offsetOutput + (0 * outputComponentSize));
553 priv::CopyPackedRGB<isSigned, normalized, true>((packedValue >> greenShift) & rgbMask,
554 offsetOutput + (1 * outputComponentSize));
555 priv::CopyPackedRGB<isSigned, normalized, true>((packedValue >> blueShift) & rgbMask,
556 offsetOutput + (2 * outputComponentSize));
557 priv::CopyPackedAlpha<isSigned, normalized, true>(alphaDefaultValueBits,
558 offsetOutput + (3 * outputComponentSize));
559 }
560}
561
562template <bool isSigned, bool normalized>
563inline void CopyW2XYZ10ToXYZW32FVertexData(const uint8_t *input,
564 size_t stride,
565 size_t count,
566 uint8_t *output)
567{
568 const size_t outputComponentSize = 4;
569 const size_t componentCount = 4;
570
571 const uint32_t rgbMask = 0x3FF; // 1 set in bits 0 through 9
572 const size_t redShift = 22; // red is bits 22 through 31
573 const size_t greenShift = 12; // green is bits 12 through 21
574 const size_t blueShift = 2; // blue is bits 2 through 11
575
576 const uint32_t alphaMask = 0x3; // 1 set in bits 0 and 1
577 const size_t alphaShift = 0; // Alpha is the 30 and 31 bits
578
579 for (size_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
580 {
581 GLuint packedValue = *reinterpret_cast<const GLuint *>(input + (i * stride));
582 uint8_t *offsetOutput = output + (i * outputComponentSize * componentCount);
583
584 priv::CopyPackedRGB<isSigned, normalized, true>((packedValue >> redShift) & rgbMask,
585 offsetOutput + (0 * outputComponentSize));
586 priv::CopyPackedRGB<isSigned, normalized, true>((packedValue >> greenShift) & rgbMask,
587 offsetOutput + (1 * outputComponentSize));
588 priv::CopyPackedRGB<isSigned, normalized, true>((packedValue >> blueShift) & rgbMask,
589 offsetOutput + (2 * outputComponentSize));
590 priv::CopyPackedAlpha<isSigned, normalized, true>((packedValue >> alphaShift) & alphaMask,
591 offsetOutput + (3 * outputComponentSize));
592 }
593}
